articles.title: SEC Reportedly Asked Coinbase to Halt All Trading—Except for Bitcoin
articles.description: Coinbase’s CEO Brian Armstrong reportedly told the Financial Times that the U.S. Securities & Exchange Commission asked him to halt trading in the exchange with all currencies except bitcoin. According to Armstrong, the suggestion came just before the SEC sue…

articles.title: Everyone's Favorite Knife-Wielding Robot Returns in Next Week's Futurama

articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: PayPal launches PYUSD stablecoin backed by the US dollar
articles.description: PayPal has launched a stablecoin called PayPal USD, starting today and “rolling out in the coming weeks.” The new stablecoin can be used for purchases and person-to-person payments.
articles.content:
PayPal launches PYUSD stablecoin backed by the US dollar
PayPal launches PYUSD stablecoin backed by the US dollar
 / PayPal USD is built on Ethereum and is 1:1 redeemable for US dollars.

articles.title: First Bitcoin ETF Could Be Coming Soon as Court Rules in Favor of Grayscale Over SEC
